25 Mar 2012
Resolutions for 2012

I resolve, for this year of 2012, to:

  • Give more
  • Spend more time considering my beliefs and goals

Am I doing the right thing with my life? Do I believe the things I was taught as a child? What do the words I live by—words like duty, honor, and country—really mean? Am I happy?
—William Deresiewicz, in Solitude and Leadership

  • Strengthen friendships

  • Improve my study habits

    • Take detailed notes
    • Iterate
    • Evaluate after completion
    • Rework
    • Discuss with others

  • Get out and about

    • Exercise
    • Enjoy nature
    • Work outdoors

(The image above is Riley Cran’s submission to the To Resolve Project)


Til next time,
Chris Ogden at 00:00
